role.argrole: the thing Arg1 is encouraged to do

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تكهن) (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM المستشار) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM القانوني) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN وزارة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الخارجية) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN البلجيكية) (NP (NOUN_PROP يان) (NOUN_PROP ديفار) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الحكم) (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يشجع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_PROP بلجيكا) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اسقاط) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN الدعوى) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المقامة) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN_PROP شارون) (PUNC .)

arg.g: to drop the law suit on Sharon
